name: Octopus Wedding Invitation - Sample
description: A large blue-green octopus swims at the top of this unique nautical wedding invitation. It might be a little too exciting for some brides, but you'll certainly know that your wedding invitation will be remembered for a long time! Cards are digitally printed on lovely tree-free 100% bamboo card stock and the envelopes are made with 30% recycled paper. Because computer monitor color display can vary so much, I always recommend buying sample of the invite you're interested in so you'll know the look and feel of the invite before you order. Click "add to cart" to purchase the sample you see here, with invitation, rsvp and envelopes. Questions? Contact me and I'd be happy to answer them. name: Navy Octopus Wedding Invitation - Sample
description: A large navy blue octopus floats along the side of the page of these charming (and unique!) nautical wedding invitations, great for a vintage or beach themed wedding, or a wedding in an aquarium. The spiky coral on the RSVP provides a nice contrast to the wavy octopus arms on the invitation. Out of all of the invitations your guests will receive this year, they certainly won't forget these ones. The octopus and coral are both from old scientific illustrations, nearly 200 years old! Because the color and contrast can vary depending on your computer monitor, I always recommend buying sample of the invite you're interested in so you'll know the look and feel of the invite before you order. Click "add to cart" to purchase the sample you see here, with invitation, rsvp and envelopes. The invitations are digitally printed on bamboo paper and the envelopes are 30% PCW recycled, and Sustainable Forestry Certified. Questions? Contact me! I'll get back to you in a day or two. You can feel confident when ordering from Concertina Press because you'll be working directly with the Owner/Designer, who you can read more about here. name: Pink Squid Wedding Invitations - Sample
description: These squid wedding invitations are definitely one of a kind, and they'd be perfect for an aquarium wedding! If you love marine biology then you know that squid are one of the most interesting animals in the ocean - some squid can swim up to 25mph, in short bursts. They are also usually nocturnal and have 8 arms and two feeding tentacles, which they use to catch food. I wanted to celebrate the delicate beauty of squid on these invitations, and the delicate drifting seaweed on the RSVP cards mimic the squids' arms. Because the color and contrast can vary depending on your computer monitor, I always recommend buying sample of the invite you're interested in so you'll know the look and feel of the invite before you order. Perfect for your nautical or destination wedding, too. The loopy elegant font mimics the curl of the jellyfish tentacles. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card with matching envelope. Cards are digitally printed on lovely white 30% recycled lightly textured card stock and the envelopes are made with 30% recycled paper. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Jellyfish Wedding Invitations • Floating Jellyfish Thank You Notes All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Waves Save the Date
description: This waves save the date would be perfect for your beach wedding and pairs nicely with my waves wedding invitation. The tropical blue of the water is lovely for a Florida or Carribean wedding, or anyone getting married on the beach. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card with matching envelope. Cards are digitally printed on lovely white lightly textured 30% recycled card stock and the envelopes are made with recycled paper. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Waves Wedding Invitations • Waves Thank You Notes All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Pennant Beach Wedding Save the Dates - Sample
description: Pennants (aka "bunting") always remind me of sunny days by the ocean, with cool sea breezes whipping your hair around - this nautically-inspired wedding invitation suite was created to reflect that feeling of summer, boats and breezes. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card Cards are digitally printed on lovely 30% recycled linen card stock and the envelopes are made with 100% recycled paper. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Pennant Wedding Invitations • Waves Wedding Invitations All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Seaweed Save the Dates - Sample
description: These unusual seaweed save the dates would be lovely for your untraditional beach wedding - not all beaches are sandy, and when I think of the rocky coastal beaches of Maine, for instance, I picture the waves crashing in and swaying the seaweed that's so fir my attached to the rocks, it almost looks like hair. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card, printed on thick lightly textured white linen card stock with a coordinating pale blue envelope, digitally printed. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Grass Stalks Save the Dates • Cuttlefish Wedding Invitations All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Red Starfish Save the Date - Sample
description: If you're having a destination wedding, or you're getting married in a popular wedding spot like Cape Cod it's a good idea to send out Save the Dates one year to six months in advance of your wedding date so that your friends and family can make arrangements and find hotels early! This lovely Starfish save the date features this really exotic sea star that's red with crazy wavy arms. It's super detailed and really beautiful when printed. I found it on a french scientific illustration from the late 1800's - gorgeous! Your Sample will include a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card, digitally printed on thick lightly textured card stock. It comes with a coordinating clover green envelope, but I have other envelope color options as well - if you're interested in another color, contact me!. my card stock and envelopes are 30% post consumer waste recycled, as are the envelopes. I designed these to go with my Tide Pool Invitations. You may also like: Seaweed Sea Save the Dates • Cuttlefish Wedding Invitations Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Seahorse Save the Date - Sample
description: Did you and your special someone share a love of the sea? Maybe you met on a diving expedition or on a cruise studying marine biology? These nautical seahorse wedding invitations would be perfect for your beach wedding! A little seahorse is captured in his home of big leafy sea plants and red coral. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card Cards are digitally printed on lovely 30% recycled linen card stock and the envelopes are made with 100% recycled paper. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Seahorse Beach Wedding Invitations • Seahorse Thank You Notes All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Floating Jellyfish Save the Date - Sample
description: Having a beach wedding? These aqua jellyfish save the dates are perfect for your nautical or destination wedding. The loopy elegant font mimics the curl of the jellyfish tentacles. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card with matching envelope. Cards are digitally printed on lovely 30% recycled linen card stock and the envelopes are made with 100% recycled paper. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! name: Curlew Save the Date - Sample
description: A Curlew, a member of the sandpiper family, is a shore bird can be found all over the world, and it has a very characteristic long and slim bill that it uses to hunt for worms and small crabs. This Curlew looks great on this nautically-themed save the date. Sample includes a 4.25"x5.5" save the date card, printed on thick lightly textured white linen card stock with a coordinating navy blue envelope, digitally printed. Questions? Contact me and I'll be happy to answer your questions! You May Also Like: Shell Save the Date • Curlew Wedding Invitation All Save the Dates Click "Add to Cart" below to purchase a sample.

name: Holy Ship It's Your Birthday Card
description:
Here's a funny nautical pun birthday card for your favorite sailor. Ocean-loving guys and girls love this card and I usually sell out when I have these at craft shows!

The outside says "Holy Ship! It's your Birthday!"
The inside says "I bet you thought I'd forgotten a-boat it"

These cards are digitally printed using soy based ink, and are printed on sustainable-forestry certified paper, with a recycled envelope. It comes in a biodegradable sleeve and at 5"x7" takes one regular first-class stamp.

categories.name: Greeting Cards and Thank You Notes

name: Fisherman and Whale Birthday Card
description:
Here's a funny nautical birthday card for your favorite fisherman (or maybe fisherman's wife). Ocean-loving guys and girls love this card, and it's perfect for giving with a present.

The outside says "I got you something for your birthday..."
The inside says "but it wouldn't fit inside this card. Happy Birthday!"

These cards are digitally printed using soy based ink, and are printed on sustainable-forestry certified paper, with a recycled envelope. It comes in a biodegradable sleeve and at 5"x7" takes one regular first-class stamp.

categories.name: Greeting Cards and Thank You Notes

name: Oh Ship I Forgot Your Birthday Card
description:
Here's a funny nautical pun belated birthday card for your favorite sailor. People who love the beach love this card and I usually sell out when I have these at craft shows!

The outside says "Oh Ship! I forgot your Birthday"

The inside says "...it must have slooped my mind"

These cards are digitally printed using soy based ink, and are printed on sustainable-forestry certified paper, with an envelope made from recycled paper. It comes in a biodegradable sleeve and at 5"x7" takes one regular first-class stamp.

categories.name: Greeting Cards and Thank You Notes

name: Narwhal Notecards - set of 8
description: This little narwhal wants to say "hello!" - These 5"x7" flat correspondence cards would be perfect for a quick thank you note or a message to your pen-pal - for extra long messages you can write on the back, which is blank. They would also make a great gift for someone who loves marine biology and whales! They are packaged with pretty navy and white baker's twine I have a personalized version that you can get with your name on it here

categories.name: Greeting Cards and Thank You Notes

name: Octopus Thank You Notes - Set of 8
description: Isn't this blue green octopus beautiful? (in a spooky sort of way) Make an impact with these thank you notes, featuring an old scientific illustration of a big octopus across the top and the words "Thank You" in lovely script on the bottom. Includes 8 folded notecards and envelopes. You might also like Octopus Personalized Notes or Octopus Wedding Invitations

name: Cuttlefish Thank You Notes - Box of 8
description: My cuttlefish wedding invitations are so popular, I decided to create some thank you notes to go with them (or be completely separate, if you just love cephalopods). This is a set of 8 thank you notes with coordinating clover green envelopes. They're A1 or 4bar size (3.5x5"), so they're that cute little size, the smallest that will go through the mail. The cuttlefish are swimming across a lovely creamy linen textured folded note, and that one on the top actually wraps around to the back, too. You might also like: Cuttlefish Wedding Invitations Blue Octopus Notecards All Greeting Cards

name: Floating Jellyfish Thank You Notes - Set of 8
description: I love how the typography in the words "Thank you" mimic the swirly tentacles of the Jellyfish at the top of the card - creepy but also really pretty! The jellyfish came from a 19th century German scientific plate illustrating jellyfish, and it extends to the back side of the card. This is a set of 8 thank you notes with coordinating teal envelopes. They're A1 or 4bar size (3.5x5"), so they're that cute little size, the smallest that will go through the mail. name: Pufferfish Thank You Notes - Set of 8
description:
While it would be alarming to see a puffer in the water saying "Thank you very much" in the water, at least the sentiment would be there. These quirky Thank You notes are perfect for any occasion where you might need to say "thanks!"

These folded notecards are printed on ecru (creamy white) linen foldover cards - they hold ink really nicely and have a great texture to them.

You will receive:

- 8 foldover notes (4.25 x 5.5" when folded)
- 8 coordinating envelopes

name: Cape Cod Map Notecards - set of 8
description: Ahh, Cape Cod - summer breezes, homemade ice cream, lighthouses, minigolf, flip flops - whatever image it conjures up for you, you can always have a reminder nearby with these lovely blank notecards. I designed this card using an antique sketch from 1891 of all of the townships on the Cape. These cards were designed, printed and packaged right here in Falmouth. These folded notecards are made with high-quality linen paper - they hold ink really nicely and have a great texture to them. You might also be interested in my Cape Cod Save the Dates Wholesale available, and I guarantee they'll fly off the shelf (if you're on the Cape, that is!) You will receive: - 8 folded notes (4.25"x5.5") - 8 coordinating white linen envelopes

description: A charming little blue and white thank you card, perfect for sending out after a wedding. This is a set of 8 thank you notes with coordinating teal envelopes. name: Vintage Bike Folded Notes - Set of 10
description: These customizable set of 10 folded notes featuring your (or a gift recipient's) name printed on an A2 (4.25"x5.5") folded note with a little vintage bicycle. Each card is printed in my home studio on Cape Cod on high quality 90# cardstock with a linen finish, giving it a subtle texture that takes ink well. Every note comes with a coordinating white linen envelope. These cards are perfect for courtesy correspondence such as Thank You notes, condolence notes or for keeping in touch with friends. A great gift for your favorite bike-loving pal. After ordering, please include the name you would like on the card in the "notes to seller" section in the shopping cart. I will email you a proof within 1-2 days and will begin printing as soon as I get your approval. You might also like: Narwhal Notecards Pen and Ink Notecards All Personalized Notes

name: Narwhal Notecards - Set of 10
description:
Narwhals are basically the unicorns of the sea! This narwhal will have your name, or the name of a gift recipient's balanced on its tusk. The writing area of the 5"x7" flat card is patterned with a delicate blue wave pattern. This is a set of 10 that comes with pale blue envelopes, digitally printed on 90 lb linen finish card stock in my home studio on Cape Cod.

Please write the name you'd like on the cards in the "notes to seller" section of the checkout, I'll contact you with a proof before I print it.

name: Sea Robin Notecards - Set of 10
description: This charming little fish, a vintage illustration from the late 1800's, would probably only be camouflaged in a circus with it's bright blue fins and salmon-pink scales. He'll certainly stand out in this set of 10 folded cards and envelopes. These folded notecards will have your name or the name of a gift recipient on the front printed on ecru (creamy white) linen foldover cards - they hold ink really nicely and have a great texture to them. +0.75 each if you're interested in envelopes with pre-printed return addresses, simply contact me at right -> Please leave the name you'd like on the cards in the "notes" section of the checkout. name: Nautilus Folded Notes - Set of 10
description:
A Nautilus is sort of like a cross between a snail and a squid - they grow their own shell similar to a snail but swim around using propulsion like a squid - neat! Their shells are gorgeous, as you can see from this vintage illustration.

This set of 10 nautilus shell notecards with coordinating envelopes will have your name or the name of a gift recipient on the front printed on ecru (creamy white) linen foldover cards - they hold ink really nicely and have a great texture to them.

+0.75 each if you're interested in envelopes with pre printed return addresses.

Please leave the name you'd like on the cards in the "notes" section of the checkout.

name: Personalized Octopus Notecards - Box of 10
description:
Perfect for your favorite octopus enthusiast, this set of 10 personalized  notecards feature your (or a gift recipient's) name written on an A2 (4.25"x5.5") folded note - perfect for keeping in touch with the creature from the Black Lagoon (or your friends).

Each card is digitally printed in my home studio on Cape Cod on high quality 90# cardstock with a linen finish, giving it a subtle texture that takes ink well. Every note comes with a coordinating white linen envelope. 

After ordering, please include the name you would like on the card in the "notes to seller" section in the shopping cart. I will email you a proof within 1-2 days and will begin printing as soon as I get your approval.

name: Cuttlefish Scientific Illustration 5x7 print
description:
Do you love the look of Concertina Press stationery and invitations, but don't need any stationery OR invitations? This small framable 5x7 print is just what you need!

These two cuttlefish came from a Dutch scientific illustration from the 18th century. Scientific Illustrations were the only way that scientists could learn about different animals and plants back before photography. Nowdays most of these amazing illustrations are shut away in books, until now!

This 5"x7" print is professionally printed on 100% cotton paper, and can easily be framed with standard sized mats in an 8x10 frame, or alone in a 5"x7" frame.

Pick three of your favorites to hang together vertically or horizontally for an instant room-brightener. They'd also make a lovely gift for any of your friends and family who love the ocean.

name: Two Jellyfish Scientific Illustration 5x7 print
description:
Do you love the look of Concertina Press stationery and invitations, but don't need any stationery OR invitations? This small framable 5x7 print is just what you need!

These two pale blue jellyfish were originally drawn in the late 19th century by German illustrator Ernst Haeckel. Scientific Illustrations were the only way that scientists could learn about different animals and plants back before photography. Nowdays most of these amazing illustrations are shut away in books, until now!

This 5"x7" print is professionally printed on 100% cotton paper, and can easily be framed with standard sized mats in an 8"x10" frame, or alone in a 5"x7" frame.

Pick three of your favorites to hang together vertically or horizontally for an instant room-brightener. They'd also make a lovely gift for any of your friends and family who love the ocean.

This striking African murex shell came from a collection of 19th century illustrations. Scientific Illustrations were the only way that scientists could learn about different animals and plants back before photography. Nowdays most of these amazing illustrations are shut away in books, until now!

This 5"x7" print is professionally printed on 100% cotton paper, and can easily be framed with standard sized mats in an 8"x10" frame, or alone in a 5"x7" frame.

name: Octopus Scientific Illustration 5x7 print
description:
Do you love the look of Concertina Press stationery and invitations, but don't need any stationery OR invitations? This small framable 5x7 print is just what you need!

This gorgeous blue green octopus came from a scientific illustration from the 19th century. Scientific Illustrations were the only way that scientists could learn about different animals and plants back before photography. Nowdays most of these amazing illustrations are shut away in books, until now!

This 5"x7" print is professionally printed on 100% cotton paper, and can easily be framed with standard sized mats in an 8x10 frame, or alone in a 5"x7" frame.

Pick three of your favorites to hang together vertically or horizontally for an instant room-brightener. They'd also make a lovely gift for any of your friends and family who love the ocean.

name: Lobster Joy Christmas Cards - Set of 8
description:
You know why this little lobster is handing you some holly? Because he wants to wish you "lobstah" joy this holiday season! Oooh yeah, that's a good one! For full effect, you have to say the inside of this card in a Boston accent (or should I say "Bahstin"). If there's one thing that New Englanders like more than lobster, it's probably PUNS.

Inside, the cards say "Wishing you Lobstah joy this holiday season!". The image is a digital collage I digitally designed using two 19th century illustrations. A big thanks to my friend Barbara (or should I say "Bahbrah") who came up with this great pun!

Size: 4.25"x5.5" when folded - Just enough space to write a nice message, without the overwhelming white void a big 5x7 card has!
Printed on 30% pcw recycled paper.
Set of 8 holiday cards

name: Merry Fishmas Christmas Cards - Set of 8
description:
Merry Fishmas! Who can resist a good pun on a Christmas card? or in general. I crack myself up sometimes. On the outside of these awesome Christmas cards a big scaly fish is getting into the spirit of the season by donning a Santa hat.

Inside, the cards say "Merry Fishmas!". The image is a digital collage I made from two old illustrations. I was torn between "Fishing you a Merry Christmas" and "Merry Fishmas" but the latter won out - I wouldn't want to pull this little guy out of the ocean, when he's having so much fun!

Size: 4.25"x5.5" when folded - Just enough space to write a nice message, without the overwhelming white void a big 5x7 card has!
Printed on 30% pcw recycled paper.
Set of 8 holiday cards

name: Cape Cod Christmas Cards - set of 8
description:
My Cape Cod Notecards were so popular this summer I decided to make Cape Cod Christmas Cards to go with them! These are perfect for sending to friends or family who have moved off-Cape (or as some of us like say - "over the bridge").

Inside, the cards read "Wishing you a cozy Christmas, wherever you may be" - you can tell your friends all about your winter ice skating adventures on Nobska pond, or visiting PB Boulangerie Bistro and not having to wait in line - they'll be sad they're not here this winter!

The illustration is an old drawing from 1891 that I cleaned up and re-colored, and it lists the founding dates of all the towns - it's neat to live in a town older than the country.

Set of 8 cards with envelopes. 
Size: 4.25"x5.5" -Just enough space to write a nice message, without seeming overwhelming. 
Printed on 30% pcw recycled paper

name: Seahorse Reindeer Holiday Cards - Set of 8
description:
Behold! A seahorse dressed up like a reindeer! He's hoping that this year Santa will finally let him pull his sleigh. But he is so tiny! I don't know if it will work out - don't have "no" in your heart lil' seahorse!

Inside, the cards read "I hope Santa picks me!". The reindeer seahorse image is a digital collage I made from three 19th century illustrations. These would be so great to send to your marine-biology loving friends - who doesn't love a seahorse, come on! (Ok, they kind of look like skeletons...a little)

Set of 8 cards with envelopes.
Size: 4.25"x5.5" -Just enough space to write a nice message, without seeming overwhelming.
Printed on 30% pcw recycled paper

name: Business Cards for Dafney
description: 250 business cards
